etomica.graphics

Class Display

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.graphics.Display
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphicalElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DisplayBox, DisplayPlot, DisplayPolytope, DisplayScrollingGraph, DisplayTable, DisplayTextBox, DisplayTextBoxesCAE

    public abstract class Display
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphicalElement
    Superclass of all classes that display something from the simulation. Included are displays of graphical and tabular data, and views of the molecules as they move about during the simulation.

    • Method Detail

      • graphic

        public java.awt.Component graphic(java.lang.Object obj)
        Method of Simulation.GraphicElement interface. Default action is to return this Display (which is a Panel) as the graphic object. May override in subclass to return a more appropriate graphical element, or none at all.
        Specified by:
        graphic in interface GraphicalElement
        Parameters:
        obj - An object that might be used to specify the graphic that the GraphicalElement is to return. In most cases the GraphicalElement ignores this parameter, and it can be set to null.
        Returns:
        A Component that can be used in the GUI of a graphical simulation
        See Also:
        Device, Display

      • graphic

        public final java.awt.Component graphic()
        Same as graphic method with a null argument.
